attributes.action: Stop the link between England and the United States of America and help out Palestine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want to stop connections with the US, because of the corruption in the goverment, on september 11th 2001 five israelies were arrested by the FBI, for carrying explosives that could cause severe damage to the George Washington Bridge. This was on the news for one day and we never heard about this again, but on december 25th 2009, a nigerian who failed to destroy a plane was caught and this news spread to everyone. Is this a Coincidence?

We also want to ask the priminister to help out people of Palestine and aid them.

Take off the blindfold and take a real look at the goverment.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
